name: Wildheart
description:
A simple, text-based game created in Twine. Play through the story of Little Red Riding Hood from the POV of the antagonist. Who will you eat? Will Grandma suspect? What will become of the basket of delicious, delicious pastries?

(Eventually, I hope to add two more branches to this game: "Yellow" and "Green." For now, the "Red" branch is complete.)
